
KRoot
===========================================================================

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|—                                                                          |—                                                                          |- ``run``                                                                  |- ``KApplicationRunner``                                                   |—                                                                          |—                                                                          |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``Random``                                                               |- ``KDummyRandom``                                                         |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``kemfield``                                                             |- ``KEMRoot``                                                              |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``geometry_printer``                                                     |- ``KGGeometryPrinter``                                                    |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``geometry``                                                             |- ``KGInterface``                                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``messages``                                                             |- ``KMessageTable``                                                        |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_window``                                                          |- ``KROOTWindow``                                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``kassiopeia``                                                           |- ``KSRoot``                                                               |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``vtk_window``                                                           |- ``KVTKWindow``                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``NamedRandomGenerator``                                                 |- ``KommonNamedRandomGenerator``                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KApplicationRunner
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``run``                                                                    |``KApplicationRunnerBuilder.cxx``                                          |- ``app``                                                                  |- ``KNamedReference``                                                      |- ``name``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``constant_electric_field``                                              |- ``KElectrostaticConstantField``                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |

|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``induced_azimuthal_electric_field``                                     |- ``KInducedAzimuthalElectricField``                                       |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``magnetic_dipole_field``                                                |- ``KMagneticDipoleField``                                                 |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``magnetic_superposition_field``                                         |- ``KMagneticSuperpositionField``                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``constant_magnetic_field``                                              |- ``KMagnetostaticConstantField``                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``magnetic_fieldmap``                                                    |- ``KMagnetostaticFieldmap``                                               |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``magnetic_fieldmap_calculator``                                         |- ``KMagnetostaticFieldmapCalculator``                                     |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``ramped_transitional_electric_field``                                   |- ``KRampedElectric2Field``                                                |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``ramped_electric_field``                                                |- ``KRampedElectricField``                                                 |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``ramped_magnetic_field``                                                |- ``KRampedMagneticField``                                                 |                                                                           |                                                                           |

|``electric_quadrupole_field``                                              |``KElectricQuadrupoleFieldBuilder.cc``                                     |—                                                                          |—                                                                          |- ``location``                                                             |- ``KEMStreamableThreeVector``                                             |

|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``spaces``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KGInterface
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``spaces``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |

KMessageTable
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``messages``                                                               |``KMessageBuilder.cxx``                                                    |- ``message``                                                              |- ``KMessageData``                                                         |- ``precision``                                                            |- ``KMessagePrecision``                                                    |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``file``                                                                 |- ``KTextFile``                                                            |- ``shutdown_message``                                                     |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``parser_context``                                                       |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``terminal``                                                             |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``log``                                                                  |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``format``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KMessageData
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``message``                                                                |``KMessageBuilder.cxx``                                                    |—                                                                          |—                                                                          |- ``precision``                                                            |- ``KMessagePrecision``                                                    |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``shutdown_message``                                                     |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``parser_context``                                                       |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``key``                                                                  |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``terminal``                                                             |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``log``                                                                  |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``format``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KROOTWindow
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``root_window``                                                            |``KROOTWindowBuilder.cxx``                                                 |- ``root_geometry_painter``                                                |- ``KGROOTGeometryPainter``                                                |- ``active``                                                               |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_pad``                                                             |- ``KROOTPad``                                                             |- ``write_enabled``                                                        |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_magfield_painter``                                                |- ``KSROOTMagFieldPainter``                                                |- ``name``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_potential_painter``                                               |- ``KSROOTPotentialPainter``                                               |- ``path``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_track_painter``                                                   |- ``KSROOTTrackPainter``                                                   |                                                                           |                                                                           |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_zh_painter``                                                      |- ``KSROOTZonalHarmonicsPainter``                                          |                                                                           |                                                                           |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KGROOTGeometryPainter
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``root_geometry_painter``                                                  |``KGROOTGeometryPainterBuilder.cc``                                        |—                                                                          |—                                                                          |- ``plane_normal``                                                         |- ``KThreeVector``                                                         |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``plane_point``                                                          |- ``KThreeVector``                                                         |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``show_labels``                                                          |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``save_json``                                                            |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``save_svg``                                                             |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``swap_axis``                                                            |- ``bool``                                                                 |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``epsilon``                                                              |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``name``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``file``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``path``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``surfaces``                                                             |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``spaces``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

KROOTPad
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|element name                                                               |source file                                                                |child elements                                                             |child types                                                                |attributes                                                                 |attribute types                                                            |

|``root_pad``                                                               |``KROOTWindowBuilder.cxx``                                                 |- ``root_geometry_painter``                                                |- ``KGROOTGeometryPainter``                                                |- ``xlow``                                                                 |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_magfield_painter``                                                |- ``KSROOTMagFieldPainter``                                                |- ``ylow``                                                                 |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_potential_painter``                                               |- ``KSROOTPotentialPainter``                                               |- ``xup``                                                                  |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_track_painter``                                                   |- ``KSROOTTrackPainter``                                                   |- ``yup``                                                                  |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``root_zh_painter``                                                      |- ``KSROOTZonalHarmonicsPainter``                                          |- ``name``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``radial_safety_margin``                                                 |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``r_steps``                                                              |- ``int``                                                                  |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``z_steps``                                                              |- ``int``                                                                  |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``name``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``x_axis``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``y_axis``                                                               |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``electric_field``                                                       |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``magnetic_field``                                                       |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``path``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``file``                                                                 |- ``string``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``geometry_type``                                                        |- ``string``                                                               |
+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------+

|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``adjustment_up``                                                        |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``adjustment_down``                                                      |- ``double``                                                               |
|                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |                                                                           |- ``step_rescale``                                                         |- ``double``                                                               |
